org.hibernate.search.bridge.spi

Interface EncodingBridge

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DurationBridge, ElasticsearchBooleanBridge, ElasticsearchCalendarBridge, ElasticsearchDateBridge, ElasticsearchInstantBridge, ElasticsearchLocalDateBridge, ElasticsearchLocalDateTimeBridge, ElasticsearchLocalTimeBridge, ElasticsearchMonthDayBridge, ElasticsearchOffsetDateTimeBridge, ElasticsearchOffsetTimeBridge, ElasticsearchTemporalAccessorStringBridge, ElasticsearchYearBridge, ElasticsearchYearMonthBridge, ElasticsearchZonedDateTimeBridge, EncodingStringBridge, InstantBridge, NumericEncodingCalendarBridge, NumericEncodingDateBridge, NumericFieldBridge, YearBridge

    public interface EncodingBridge
    Interface implemented by bridges that encode information in a specific format.

    Those bridges should:

    • declare the numeric encoding, if any, in order to expose it in the metadata
    • declare the null marker, in order to enable Field.indexNullAs().

    Bridges that do not implement this interface will be attributed a null numeric encoding and fields with those bridges will use a simple null marker holding a string.

    Author:
    Yoann Rodiere
    Experimental
    This contract is currently under active development and may be altered in future releases, breaking existing users.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NullMarker createNullMarker(String indexNullAs) 
      NumericFieldSettingsDescriptor.NumericEncodingType getEncodingType()
      Define the numeric encoding to use for the brdige.

    • Method Detail

      • getEncodingType

        NumericFieldSettingsDescriptor.NumericEncodingType getEncodingType()
        Define the numeric encoding to use for the brdige.
        Returns:
        the encoding to use for this bridge, or NumericFieldSettingsDescriptor.NumericEncodingType.UNKNOWN if this bridge does not use numeric encoding.

      • createNullMarker

        NullMarker createNullMarker(String indexNullAs)
                     throws IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        indexNullAs - The value of Field.indexNullAs().
        Returns:
        The marker to use when a value is missing.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If indexNullAs cannot be encoded in the required format.
